EmailTemplate.name: 17.Radio.AirScale.AirScal.L.G.N.17206.AirScale 2017.Email 3 - AirScale
EmailTemplate.subject: Cloud RAN: satisfy any demand, anytime, anywhere
EmailTemplate.textOnly: ${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Satisfy any demand, anytime, anywhere Cloud RAN: React instantly to meet new demands Cloud-based RAN flexibility lets you meet any demand, wherever it arises, even over great distances. AirScale Cloud RAN is proven to deliver high bandwidth and low latency to boost your business, as Korea’s SK Telecom found to its benefit. Connect with us © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia. Karaportti 3, 02610 Espoo, Finland Contact us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy policy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia Networks or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
